mapper.sql: id, name, work_number, avator, position, create_time
mapper.insert: insert into characters (id, name, work_number, avator, position, create_time, description) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into characters
id,

avator,
position,
create_time,
description,

update characters
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

position = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
